<<<<<<< HEAD
A godlie and fruitfull treatise of faith and workes. Wherein is confuted a certaine opinion of merit by workes, which an aduersary to the gospell of Christ Iesu, held in the conference, had in the Tower of London H. D., fl. 1583. Dod, Henry, attributed name. aut
104 p.
Printed [by H. Bynneman] for Gregory Seton, and are to be sold at his shop vnder Aldersgate, London : 1583.
Dedication signed: H. D., i.e. Henry Dod?--STC. Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
